name: AVANT GARDE LIGHT (UE4 Megajam 2017)
description:
Theme of the megajam "However vast the darkness, we must supply our own light".

This narrative adventure doesn't take the words as literally as some other entries might and instead offers a gripping story of mental illness, love and uncertainty.

Assets used from outside of jam time:

  • Rain texture, taken from Marketplace asset: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/advanced-glass-material-pack
  • Intro music provided by Kongru (with permission): https://soundcloud.com/kongru
  • Coffee Mug taken from Realistic Rendering example: https://docs.unrealengine.com/latest/INT/Resources/Showcases/RealisticRendering/
  • Nick Darnell's Loading Screen Plugin: https://github.com/ue4plugins/LoadingScreen/
  • Smoke from Content Examples: https://docs.unrealengine.com/latest/INT/Resources/ContentExamples/
